summary: Frontend testing of OMEGA Dashboard P0 revisions (US units, compact node list, comms availability clarity) and P1 new tiles (Camera, Security, Music, Hotkeys customization). All 21 features tested and PASSED with MOCKED data.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED by design - GPS status, comms status, people, albums, hotkeys all use mock data
Camera/Security/Music tiles are UI placeholders that will be wired to Pi later
GPS units correctly converted from meters to feet (±13.8 ft, 171 ft altitude)
Comms unavailable status now shows RED color instead of gray
Node Avatar Strip shows horizontal scrollable row with initials, status badges, and short names
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by getMockGpsStatus(), getMockCommsStatus(), mockPeople, mockAlbums, allHotkeys
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 and P1 features tested and working. Key test IDs: gps-status-bar, node-avatar-strip, node-avatars, comms-availability-panel, degraded-explanation, camera-tile, camera-sections, diary-view, overlay-toggle, security-tile, people-list, tab-education, security-education, music-tile, hotkeys-bar, customize-hotkeys-btn, hotkeys-customize-modal

P0-1_gps_status_bar_feet.details: GPS status bar shows ±13.8 ft accuracy and 171 ft altitude in US units

P0-1_comms_knowledge_miles.details: Comms Knowledge Quick Decision Guide shows '0.5–6 mi apart' for Mesh/LoRa

P0-1_gps_guide_feet_thresholds.details: GPS Guide shows accuracy thresholds in feet: 80-165 ft (3-4 sats), 33-80 ft (5-7 sats), <33 ft (8+ sats)

P0-2_node_avatar_strip_horizontal.details: NodeAvatarStrip shows horizontal scrollable row with 4 nodes

P0-2_node_avatars_initials_badges.details: Node avatars show initials (DO, MO, KO, BU), status badges (GOOD, OKAY, HELP, OFF), and short names

P0-2_node_avatar_click_drawer.details: Clicking node avatar opens node details/drawer

P0-3_comms_helper_text.details: Comms panel shows 'Select a communication method. Available methods highlight automatically.'

P0-3_unavailable_red_color.details: SMS and HF cards show 'Unavailable' in RED text (text-destructive class)

P0-3_status_legend.details: Status legend shows Available (green), Degraded (yellow), Unavailable (red) indicators

P0-3_degraded_explanation.details: Selecting Mesh (degraded) shows explanation area with 'What Degraded means', 'Typical causes', and 'How to fix'

P1-4_camera_tile_sections.details: Camera tile shows 4 sections: Daily Diary, Photos, Videos, Voice Memo

P1-4_camera_diary_timestamp_toggle.details: Diary view has 'Overlay date + time' toggle that shows timestamp on preview

P1-5_security_people_list.details: Security tile shows People list with 3 people: John (Admin, 2 fingerprints), Sarah (Member, 1), Kids (Guest, 0)

P1-5_security_help_accordions.details: Security Help tab shows accordions: 'How to add fingerprints', 'How permissions work', 'Troubleshooting'

P1-6_music_mini_player.details: Music tile shows mini player with play/pause, skip controls, and progress bar

P1-6_music_sections.details: Music tile shows Most Played, Liked, Albums tabs

P1-6_music_coming_soon.details: Music tile shows 'COMING SOON' section with Lyrics and Music Videos placeholders

P1-7_hotkeys_bar_8_default.details: Hotkeys bar shows 8 default hotkeys: Comms Hub, Map, Flashlight, SOS/Beacon, Notes, Scanner, Files Drop, Battery

P1-7_customize_modal.details: Customize button opens modal with Pinned list and Available Hotkeys sections

P1-7_reorder_hotkeys.details: Up/down buttons reorder hotkeys - tested moving Map to top position

P1-7_add_remove_hotkeys.details: Minus button removes hotkey from pinned, plus button adds from available - tested removing Battery

previous_features_tabs.details: All 5 tabs working: Global Chat, Map, Codes, Comms Knowledge, GPS Guide

screenshots_taken: 01_initial_load.jpeg - Initial page load with HotkeysBar and Comms Panel
03_gps_guide.jpeg - GPS Guide tab with feet units
04_map_node_strip.jpeg - Map tab with Node Avatar Strip
09_diary_view.jpeg - Camera diary view with timestamp toggle

mocked_apis_list: getMockGpsStatus() - returns GPS status with feet units (±13.8 ft, 171 ft altitude)
getMockCommsStatus() - returns comms status: LAN=available, Mesh=degraded, SMS=unavailable, HF=unavailable
mockPeople - 3 people with permission levels (Admin, Member, Guest)
mockAlbums - 6 placeholder albums for Music tile
